search_2070_m23_2/6201_1201_0100_10:
Looks like this is the spot where they’re gonna hold
the fireworks festival.
search_2070_m23_2/6201_1201_0500_10: Ugh. What’s that twerp doing here?
search_2070_m23_2/6201_1201_0600_10: Don’t worry, I have an idea. Just leave [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ] to me!
search_2070_m23_2/6201_1201_0700_10:
Say, twerp, I don’t know if you’ve heard
the rumors...
search_2070_m23_2/6201_1201_0800_10:
but apparently, some no-good scoundrels are
planning to ruin this fireworks festival!
search_2070_m23_2/6201_1201_0900_10:
We should split into two groups to patrol the area
and keep the festival safe!
search_2070_m23_2/6201_1201_1000_10:
Why don’t you patrol that area waaay over there?
We’re counting on you!
search_2070_m23_2/6202_1201_0100_10:
The sync pairs are all distracted by the fireworks.
Now’s our chance!
search_2070_m23_2/6202_1201_0200_10:
We’ve got to be careful not to let the Trainers
catch us stealing their Pokémon!
search_2070_m23_2/6202_1201_0300_10:
Phew! The bad guys have been caught! The
festival is safe now!
search_2070_m23_2/6202_1201_0400_10:
Why don’t you go enjoy the fireworks festival with
your partner Pokémon, too?
search_2070_m23_2/6203_1201_0100_10:
Our partner Pokémon pilfering was a
huge success!
search_2070_m23_2/6203_1201_0200_10:
All we gotta do now is take our haul back to HQ
and show the boss...
search_2070_m23_2/6203_1201_0300_10:
And we’ll get promoted so fast, our heads
will spin!
search_2070_m23_2/6203_1201_0700_10:
Nice work finding us. I’m guessing you’re here to
take these Pokémon back?
search_2070_m23_2/6203_0401_0900_10: Oh, come on! Don’t give us that look!
search_2070_m23_2/6203_0402_1100_10: Of course! We’re Team Rocket, after all!
search_2070_m23_2/6203_1201_1200_10:
The only reason we gained your trust was so we
could steal your Pokémon!
search_2070_m23_2/6203_1201_1300_10:
I have to warn you, though. We aren’t like those
Team Break hoodlums!
search_2070_m23_2/6203_1201_1400_10:
Our work here is all for our magnificent
boss, Giovanni!
search_2070_m23_2/6203_1201_1500_10:
His dream is to assemble an army of powerful
Pokémon and use them to rule the world.
search_2070_m23_2/6203_1201_1600_10:
He believes doing that will protect the world
from devastation and unite all peoples within
our nation!
search_2070_m23_2/6203_1201_1700_10:
We of Team Rocket denounce the evils of truth
and love!
search_2070_m23_2/6203_1201_1800_10:
Meowth, that’s right! We got our own code
of justice!
search_2070_m23_2/6203_1201_2100_10: You want to battle us? But...
search_2070_m23_2/6203_1201_2200_10:
Do ya really think ya can beat us as just one
measly sync pair?
search_2070_m23_2/6203_1201_2300_10:
We’ve overcome a lot of hardships together. Our
bonds are the real deal!
search_2070_m23_2/6203_1201_2400_10:
All right, without further ado, it’s time for business
as usual!
search_2070_m23_2/6203_1201_2700_10:
All righty, then. Let’s do it before the battle. I’m
sure you wanna hear it, too, don’tcha?
search_2070_m23_2/6204_1201_0100_10:
So this fireworks festival is about strengthening the
bonds of sync pairs, huh?
search_2070_m23_2/6204_1201_0200_10: You want to comfort me? Thanks!
search_2070_m23_2/6204_1201_0300_10: You’re the partner Pokémon for me, Weezing!
search_2070_m23_2/6204_1201_0400_10:
Oh, it’s you. Have you already returned all the
Pokémon to their Trainers?
search_2070_m23_2/6204_1201_0500_10:
So what do you want with us, then? Go on, get
out of here!
search_2070_m23_2/6204_1201_0700_10:
Ya don’t approve of the bad things we do, but
you could sense our team’s bond during our
battle earlier?
search_2070_m23_2/6204_0302_0900_10: That sure was a great battle!
search_2070_m23_2/6204_1201_1000_10:
You may have gotten the best of us this time, but
don’t think for a minute that we’ve given up on
Celebi or all the partner Pokémon here!
search_2070_m23_2/6204_1201_1100_10: We’ll find an opening to steal them! Just you wait!
search_2070_m23_2/6204_1201_1200_10:
No matter how many times we fall, Team Rocket
always gets back up!
search_2070_m23_2/6204_0302_1400_10: I’ll stop you next time, too!
search_2070_m23_2/6204_1201_1500_10:
Heroes and villains... People and Pokémon...
We’re lookin’ up at the same sky, huh?
search_2070_m23_2/6204_1201_1600_10:
I guess moments like this aren’t so bad every once
in a while.
search_2070_m23_2/6204_1201_1700_10:
We may still be enemies, but as long as we’re
heading in the same direction...
search_2070_m23_2/6204_1201_1800_10: we might as well lend you a hand!
